backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing presale state, tracking ICP contributions, allocations, timestamps, and exposing query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing formatting update for ICP remaining display and listing related frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page containing root mount node and module script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout combining presale sections with animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a table with loading states and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Renders a styled countdown timer using values from the 24-hour countdown hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the deposit address with a copy-to-clipboard button and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Hero section with animated meme image, gradient headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: UI section explaining the three-step presale contribution process and listing key presale parameters.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress with a progress bar, ICP stats, and an ended badge using live presale status data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress display, and deposit address into a full presale status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Shows tokenomics info and a FAQ section including supply, blockchain, and presale details.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches and polls the contributor list from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a 24‑hour countdown timer with hours, minutes, and seconds updated every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Fetches and polls presale status data from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines theme CSS variables including neon colors, and adds custom animations and utility classes for neon effects and motion.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App with global styles.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw Contribution entries by address, summing ICP amounts and sorting by most recent timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers using German thousands separators with no decimals for ICP display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, including OKLCH-based color tokens, neon colors, container settings, and custom keyframes/plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s presale site goals, architecture, features, and known issues for planning and tracking.
